name: Action Man: Operation Extreme
description: In Action Man you save the world from evil Doctor X. As a 3D platform adventure, Action Man features several different types of stages: run-and-gun levels in the third-person perspective and vehicular segments where you can hop in a car, boat, or an airplane to zip through the danger zone. Like all good spy-thrillers, look forward to plenty of plot twists to carry you through to the end game. Can you stop Dr. X?
